title: Mountain Pack
description: AAA quality mountain pack of 16 individual Mountain-Meshes.
longDescription:
Introducing the Ultimate Mountain Pack – your gateway to unlocking breathtaking landscapes and elevating your digital creations to new heights. Immerse yourself in a world of awe-inspiring beauty and intricate detail, carefully crafted to empower your creative visions.

Unveiling Nature's Grandeur: Experience the majesty of 16 meticulously crafted mountains, each a masterpiece in its own right. With 10 resplendent snow-clad peaks and 6 diverse alternatives, these mountains bring forth an unparalleled sense of realism and authenticity. The sheer scale of the 16 mountain meshes, boasting an astounding 8 million triangles each, transports you to the heart of nature's grandeur.

Empowering Customization: At the core of this pack lies the power of customization. Style your terrains to perfection using the provided heightmaps for mountains, craters, and scenes. My custom material, equipped with heightmaps for layered materials, puts the reins of creativity in your hands. The result? A landscape that speaks your language – a symphony of textures and elements crafted to your unique vision.

Seamless Integration: Seamlessly integrate these breathtaking landscapes into your projects with scalable landscape maps for every element.

Engineering Wonders: Discover the sheer ingenuity of this Mountain Pack. With each mountain boasting approximately 4 million vertices, it's a testament to the depth and complexity this pack brings to your creations. Experience the epitome of optimization with Nanite technology – no LODs needed, guaranteeing every angle is a masterpiece.

Your Adventure Begins: From game developers to virtual reality enthusiasts, from architects to filmmakers, the Ultimate Mountain Pack is the catalyst that transforms concepts into captivating realities. It's time to capture the essence of nature's splendor and infuse it into your digital canvas – your adventure into the extraordinary starts now.


!!! The Megascans materials used for the product images are not included. The included material has been generated automatically !!!


But do not hesitate to contact me for more informations
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •     16 Mountain Meshes
  •     Mountain Meshes with ~ 8.000.000 triangles each
  •     Customizable material
  • Included heightmaps for layering materials
  • 10 Mountains with Snow-Heightmaps
  • 6 Mountains with Heightmaps, Slopemaps, Occlusionmaps and Flowmaps

Number of unique meshes: 16

Collision: Yes - automatically generated

Vertex count: per mountain ~ 4.000.000 vertices

LODs: 0

Number of materials and material instances 4 materials + 16 material instances

Number of textures: 16 AI Generated Textures + 1 Perlin Noise + 44 Heightmaps/Layermaps

Texture resolutions: Heightmaps: 4096x4096, Perlin Noise: 1024x1024, AI: 512x512

Supported development platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Not tested

Documentation: N/A

Important/Additional Notes: N/A
